tool_description: You Can Get All Cryptos Price Real Time With Rate Change.
title: CryptoPriceTracker

api_list.name: Get All Coins Prices
api_list.description: This Endpoint Will Return Coin Currency Name , Price, RateChange.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptopricetracker.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptopricetracker.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
